DOC.brief_summary: Objectives 1 . To test effectiveness acceptability augment internet-supported transdiagnostic intervention Romania . 2 . To assess cost-effectiveness Internet version transdiagnostic program compare standard treatment/usual care .
DOC.detailed_description: The effectiveness transdiagnostic intervention compare wait list control group use randomize control trial ( RCT ) design culture test . The treatment approach mainly emotion-focus , teach participant confront experience uncomfortable emotion , adaptive coping mechanism could use . Because internet-delivered intervention represent effective way disseminate evidence-based program , investigator decide present intervention online .
DOC.criteria: fluent Romanian 18 year principal diagnostic generalize anxiety disorder and/or obsessivecompulsive disorder and/or panic disorder and/or social anxiety disorder and/or major depression disorder and/or dysthymia ( combination diagnostics ) Structured Clinical Interview Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders ( SCIDI ) access Internet connect computer suicidal ideation ongoing psychological treatment generalize anxiety disorder and/or obsessivecompulsive disorder and/or panic disorder and/or social anxiety disorder and/or major depression disorder and/or dysthymia primary disorder need treatment obstacle participation ( i.e. , long travel plan ) recent change psychiatric medication ( i.e. , last 6 week )
